positive_judgement.rationale: The mediation acknowledges the complexity of the situation by recognizing that not all PCM users are complicit in hate, which is a nuanced and fair approach. final_verdict.rationale: The mediation provides a balanced perspective by acknowledging the complexity of the situation and recognizing that not all PCM users are complicit in hate.
